org.sensorhub.api.module

Class ModuleConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.module.ModuleConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientConfig, CommConfig, HttpServerConfig, ProcessConfig, SensorConfig, SensorDriverConfig, ServiceConfig, StorageConfig

    public class ModuleConfig
extends Object
implements Cloneable

    Base class to hold modules' configuration options

    Since:
    Nov 16, 2010
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Field Detail

      • id

        @DisplayInfo(label="Module ID",
             desc="Unique local ID of the module")
public String id
        Unique ID of the module. It must be unique within the SensorHub instance and remain the same during the whole life-time of the module

      • moduleClass

        @DisplayInfo(label="Module Class",
             desc="Module implementation class")
public String moduleClass
        Class implementing the module (will be instantiated when module is loaded)

      • name

        @DisplayInfo(label="Module Name")
public String name
        User chosen name for the module

      • enabled

        @DisplayInfo(label="Enable",
             desc="Module state (enabled or disabled)")
public boolean enabled
        Reflects state of the module (enable/disable)
